title: How does technology work today? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are shaped by our tools, but we also reshape them, and this is an ongoing process. It is an interaction, not an action. I would like to suggest that technologies do not have effects, nor are they effected upon. A hammer can do many things like drive a nail, stop a door, kindle a fire, bang a gong, but its features enable certain uses, and through that ennoblement continue to suggest uses, and by extension ways of thinking and seeing the world. Its clearly means “Technology works how you like to”.

Technology works now as it worked in the past to make people’s life easier in some way or the other. With the advent of technology , lives have been made easier and in turn produced more innovative technologies.
